title: Knowledge-Integrated Collaborative Learning Program to Strengthen Inquiry-Based Science Instructional Design Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Core science curriculum concepts and basic knowledge of lesson planning
context.additional_context: Training in designing collaborative inquiry lessons within mobile environments using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can create lesson activity designs incorporating scientific inquiry elements across three or more stages.
Learners can propose at least two inquiry-promoting strategies for peers’ lesson designs through collaborative feedback processes.
Learners can explain methods to encourage learners’ inquiry activities by applying a knowledge integration framework on mobile platforms within 150 words.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
